Name: The round count feature
I want: add a choice that player can know the current round of the game
So that: player can know how many steps that they have made and know the how long has the current game goes
IMPL Details: Create a function which can help the user to know their rounds therefore they are no need to count their rounds manually.

Name: New robort agent
I want: A new bot agent which has difficulty between random and greedy
So that: there are more different level of game that against the robot and help me to get used to this game instead of fighting the greedy robot directly after againsting the random one.
IMPL Details: We use a global static integer number to record the winning times of human players in the ThreeMusketeers class. And we create an interface to implement the state model. If the win time is less than 1, the state will be the RandomAgent state, which uses getMove from RandomAgent. Then if the win time is less than 3 and more than 1, the growth agent state is randomly set to half RandomAgent and half GreedyAgent, which means that it has 50% use getMove() from either GreedyAgent or RandomAgent. Finally, if the win time is greater than 5, it will have an 80% chance of using getMove() from the GreedyAgent.

Name: Dangerous Remind
I want: The image of musketeers are changed when excatly two of musketeers on the same row or column
So that: I can clearly realize that my situation may not be optimistic or dangerously approaching
IMPL Details: Once a new move appears in the game, the game checks the board for Dangerous Musketeers and if so adds them to the Dangerous Musketeers list. The Dangerous Musketeers list helps us to attract Musketeers who need to change their image. And the notification feature will remind dangerous musketeers to update their image in the next round.

Name: Scalable Undo
I want: Provide a more scalable and future proof implementation of the undo feature.
So that: Allows future developers to have an easier time saving new attributes to an undo stack and will make the backend more user-friendly
IMPL Details: Using memento pattern to store states of board

Name: Safe Initialization of ThreeMusketeers class
I want: A thread-safe implementation of the ThreeMusketters class employing the singleton pattern.
So that: Allows future features such as multiplayer to be more easily implemented and removes risk of ambiguous ThreeMuskeers objects

Name: User Login
I want: Ability to login by the assigned user name and password to saved counted games which store in the resource by visitor pattern.
So that: This will help the assigned user to know how many games he has played.

Name: The archive features
I want: A feature that allows me to save different progress in the game
So that: I can start the game from the selected progress before the next game starts
IMPL Details: Users can play the game more flexible, this feature help them save the game progress when they want to save and they can restart at any time.
